name: dynamic-punch
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 100% chance to confuse the target.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Powerful and sure to cause
confusion, but inaccurate.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Powerful and sure to cause
confusion, but inaccurate.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
The foe is punched
with the user’s full
power. It confuses
the foe if it hits.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The foe is punched
with the user’s full,
concentrated power.
It confuses the foe
if it hits.

with the user’s full,
concentrated power.
It confuses the foe
if it hits.
